entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workspace Project: missing `OnCompilationOutputInfoChanged()` #63115
  • MoveTypeCodeRefactoringProvider when trying to move struct from interface to separate cs file #63114
    17.4
  • "Toggle Line Comment" comments in a way that violates stylecop rules for C# #63113
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete Should Concatenate Suggestions from All Valid Generic Overloads #63108
    Backlog
  • Add `dotnet_compiler_diagnostic` element to complement `dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic` #63107
    Backlog

Closed

  • Question: How can I combine multiple IncrementalValuesProvider<T> #63093
  • dotnet build support for projects with Source Generators where .Net Standard 1.0 library used in generation-time #60004
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use snapshot services #63121
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #63120
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63119
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • WIP: Avoid cases in OOP of accessing .Solution.Workspace #63118
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow access of .Solution.Workspace in remote scenarios. #63116
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify construction of hte RemoteWorkspace #63112
    Area-IDE
  • Explore use of compression in sqlite #63111
    Area-IDE
  • Use ToImmutableAndClear when using a pooled builder with a known length #63110
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid intermediary array allocation when computing checksums #63109
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Hot Reload: Fix reloadable type regression #63106
    Area-Interactive, 17.3

Updated

  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Put correct function call for Return Attributes #63084
    Area-IDE
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE
  • Single-thread crossgen InteractiveHost64 for determinism build #62918
    Area-Infrastructure
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #62854
    Area-IDE
  • Handle scenario where initial completion list contains only a single non-roslyn item #63083
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
